glsa.title: TikiWiki: Arbitrary command execution through XML-RPC
glsa.synopsis: TikiWiki includes PHP XML-RPC code, making it vulnerable to arbitrary command execution.

background.p: TikiWiki is a web-based groupware and content management system (CMS), using PHP, ADOdb and Smarty. TikiWiki includes vulnerable PHP XML-RPC code.

description.p: TikiWiki is vulnerable to arbitrary command execution as described in GLSA 200507-01.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary PHP code by sending specially crafted XML data.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All TikiWiki users should upgrade to the latest version:
